description: A slightly modified version of the original mustang-colorscheme for vim by hcalves
Alternative way of navigating in a file based on highlighted chars
Toggle file-type sensible comments with a shortcut
Insert mode auto-completion for quotes, parens, brackets, etc
Close tags automatically with CTRL+_ in insert mode.
:BufOnly without an argument will unload all buffers but the current one.
Extended % matching for HTML, LaTeX, and many other languages
Former zencoding: expand CSS-like expressions into HTML code
Highlight JavaScript's Template Strings contents in other FileType syntax rule (HTML in Angular2 template prop)
Asynchronous execution library for Vim, needed by tsuquyomi
TypeScript IDE: autocompletion, goto definition, show all references
